msbt.message: What'd I come here for again? Should've written it down.Oh well! I'll just grab whatever. Maybe that'll jog my memory
Every time I come here, I end up with junk I don't need.I mean, usually I can sell it to my buddies, butstill, !
It takes soooooo much effort not to buy everything here, .If I was rich, I'd be like gimme this, gimme that, gimme ALL of it!Right now I can barely afford window shopping
Want some advice? If you're shopping and see something you really want, just buy it.You never know if it'll be there next time, so don't wait, !
You're from , right? Anything catch your eye? Can't leave without souvenirs!
This place sells soooo much cool stuff, .If I were you, I'd be loosening those purse strings. Or walletfolds! You never know when you'll be back!
Nook's Cranny is really rockin' their inventory game.Not that I need anything right now. But more stuff to stare at is always fun, !
Nook's Cranny is way roomy! Like, I was half expecting a stage for rock shows to be in there, !
Hangin' out in Nook's Cranny just feels nice. It's so awesomely spacious, !I gotta be careful though. I've only got so much to spend, and there's a TON of cool stuff in there!
